templates.name: web-app-security
templates.description: Comprehensive security template for web applications covering authentication, authorization, data validation, and common vulnerabilities

templates.name: mobile-app-security
templates.description: Security template for iOS and Android mobile applications including secure storage, network security, and platform-specific threats

templates.name: cloud-infrastructure
templates.description: Template for securing cloud infrastructure on AWS, Azure, or GCP covering IAM, networking, storage, and compute resources

templates.name: api-security
templates.description: REST and GraphQL API security template covering authentication, rate limiting, input validation, and API-specific threats

templates.name: microservices-architecture
templates.description: Security considerations for microservices including service-to-service authentication, service mesh, and distributed tracing

templates.name: iot-device-security
templates.description: Template for Internet of Things devices covering firmware security, secure boot, device identity, and update mechanisms

templates.name: financial-application
templates.description: Security template for financial applications addressing PCI-DSS compliance, transaction security, and fraud prevention

templates.name: healthcare-hipaa
templates.description: HIPAA-compliant security template for healthcare applications covering PHI protection, access controls, and audit logging

templates.name: ecommerce-platform
templates.description: Security template for e-commerce platforms covering payment processing, customer data protection, and supply chain security

templates.name: saas-multi-tenant
templates.description: Security considerations for multi-tenant SaaS applications including tenant isolation, data segregation, and shared infrastructure
